## transform23 variable

Creates 2x3 TRS transformation matrix from given translation vector, rotation angle and scale factor/vector.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transform23: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, translate: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, rotation: number, scale: number | import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>
```
